name: react-native-ios-context-menu
description: A react-native component to use context menu's (UIMenu) on iOS 13/14+

scripts.typescript:all: yarn run typescript && yarn run typescript-example
scripts.clean: del-cli android/build example/android/build example/android/app/build example/ios/build lib
scripts.reopen:ios: yarn run close:ios && yarn run open:ios
scripts.build:update-version: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | sed 's/-.*//') && cd example/ios && agvtool new-marketing-version $PACKAGE_VERSION && xcrun agvtool next-version -all && cd ../..
scripts.build: yarn run build:js && yarn run build:ios
scripts.build:js: yarn run lint && yarn run lint:circular-dep && yarn run typescript && yarn run bob build
scripts.run:release: cd example && npx react-native run-ios --configuration Release
scripts.run:debug: cd example && npx react-native run-ios --configuration Debug
scripts.build-and-run: yarn run build && yarn run run:debug && yarn run run:release
scripts.pod-install:new-static: cd example/ios && bundle install && RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=1 USE_FRAMEWORKS='static' bundle exec pod install && cd ../.. && yarn run build:update-version && yarn run pod-install:set-env
scripts.pod-install:new-dynamic: cd example/ios && bundle install && RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=1 USE_FRAMEWORKS='dynamic' bundle exec pod install && cd ../.. && yarn run build:update-version && yarn run pod-install:set-env
scripts.pod-install:old-static: cd example/ios && RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=0 USE_FRAMEWORKS='static' pod install && cd ../.. && yarn run build:update-version && yarn run pod-install:set-env
scripts.pod-install:old-dynamic: cd example/ios && RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=0 USE_FRAMEWORKS='dynamic' pod install && cd ../.. && yarn run build:update-version && yarn run pod-install:set-env
scripts.pod-install:reopen: yarn run close:ios && yarn run pod-install && yarn run open:ios
scripts.pod-install:reopen-old: yarn run close:ios && yarn run pod-install:old && yarn run open:ios
scripts.nuke:example-pods: cd example/ios && pod cache clean --all && rm -rfv ./Pods ./build ./Podfile.lock && cd ../..
scripts.nuke:cache-js: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rfv $TMPDIR/react-* && rm -rfv $TMPDIR/react-native-packager-cache-* && rm -rfv $TMPDIR/metro-bundler-cache-* && rm -rfv $TMPDIR/haste-map-* &&  rm -rfv rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-cache && npm cache clean --force && npm cache verify && yarn cache clean && rm -rfv ~/.yarn/berry/cache
scripts.nuke:all: yarn run nuke:example-pods && yarn run nuke:cache-js && yarn run nuke:derived-data && npm run nuke:node-modules
scripts.update-dep: yarn add react-native-ios-utilities --dev && cd example && yarn add react-native-ios-utilities && cd ..
scripts.update-dep:next: yarn add react-native-ios-utilities@next --dev && cd example && yarn add react-native-ios-utilities@next && cd .. && yarn run build:update-version
scripts.update-dep:pods: cd example/ios ; bundle exec pod install --repo-update ; bundle exec pod update DGSwiftUtilities ContextMenuAuxiliaryPreview ; cd ../.. ; yarn run build:update-version
scripts.initialize: yarn run initialize:js && yarn run pod-install
scripts.initialize:js: yarn install && cd example && yarn install && cd ..
scripts.initialize:reset: npm run nuke:all && yarn && npm run initialize

author: Dominic Go <dominic@dominicgo.dev> (https://github.com/dominicstop)
